testcase.name: headerValidation

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected header "content-encoding " was not "gzip", was "null". Headers are: Server=openresty/1.9.7.1 Date=Tue, 01 May 2018 06:22:59 GMT Content-Type=application/json; charset=utf-8 Transfer-Encoding=chunked Connection=keep-alive X-Frame-Options=SAMEORIGIN X-XSS-Protection=1; mode=block X-Content-Type-Options=nosniff ETag=W/"e70c27085ed41de5321252b16c9582fe" Cache-Control=max-age=0, private, must-revalidate X-Request-Id=cfe10120-7365-45f8-987a-4cd3b0b819f3 X-Runtime=0.001313 Content-Encoding=gzip
